channel.title: [Lore Suggestion] Accepting Community Submissions -- READ FIRST!
channel.description:
We are now accepting lore submissions. While we finish coding Alpha, we'll let the lore build up -- as soon as Alpha is done coded, the devs will take a look over all the submissions. The best ones will likely be used within the game, on our [Wikia](https://tol.wikia.com), and will give you credit. We will also grant you the "Loremaster" role on [Discord](https://discord.gg/rFAXXQB) if chosen. We may do more later, such as in-game titles.
## [color=red]Rules (If you break them, we won't look at your lore):[/color] 1. You must first [read our existing lore](https://tol.wikia.com/Lore) and use our same _style_. **This is very important.** We'll know if you didn't read it :P 2. You must not edit the public Wikia with your own lore if not yet approved by a dev. 3. Try to use lore that creates a connection with other lore. 4. If you write lore about gods/deities, only write lore about **existing** deities/gods ([Corax](https://tol.wikia.com/Corax) + [Mithras](https://tol.wikia.com/Mithras)). Sure, we may introduce more later, **but not for a long time.** Don't forget that Corax/Mithras has nothing to do with the Black Rose, although you may introduce hints of a vague connection 5. Post in #classes-roles with the subject starting with **[Lore Suggestion]**. Better yet, use our template: http://forum.imperium42.com/t/lore-suggestion-template/322

Sorta. If you REALLY want it seen, better to change the topic name. We’ll be searching topics with that title.

item.title: [Lore Suggestion] Accepting Community Submissions -- READ FIRST!
item.dc:creator: í42-Xblade
item.description:
We are now accepting lore submissions. While we finish coding Alpha, we’ll let the lore build up – as soon as Alpha is done coded, the devs will take a look over all the submissions. The best ones will likely be used within the game, on our Wikia, and will give you credit. We will also grant you the “Loremaster” role on Discord if chosen. We may do more later, such as in-game titles.

Rules (If you break them, we won’t look at your lore):

  1. You must first read our existing lore and use our same style. This is very important. We’ll know if you didn’t read it
  2. You must not edit the public Wikia with your own lore if not yet approved by a dev.
  3. Try to use lore that creates a connection with other lore.
  4. If you write lore about gods/deities, only write lore about existing deities/gods (Corax + Mithras). Sure, we may introduce more later, but not for a long time. Don’t forget that Corax/Mithras has nothing to do with the Black Rose, although you may introduce hints of a vague connection
  5. Post in #classes-roles with the subject starting with [Lore Suggestion]. Better yet, use our template:
    http://forum.imperium42.com/t/lore-suggestion-template/322

Read full topic
item.source: [Lore Suggestion] Accepting Community Submissions -- READ FIRST!
